Account.description: Account represents an Alpaca trading account.

bodDtbp.description: Beginning of day day trading buying power.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the account was created (RFC 3339).

cryptoStatus.description: CryptoStatus represents the crypto trading status of an account.

daytradingBuyingPower.description: Buying power for day trading (4x equity).

patternDayTrader.description: Whether the account is a pattern day trader.

regtBuyingPower.description: Buying power for day trading (4x equity for pattern day traders).

status.description: AccountStatus represents the status of an account.

tradeSuspendedByUser.description: Whether trading is suspended by user.

AccountActivity.description: AccountActivity represents an account activity event.

AccountConfigurations.description: AccountConfigurations represents the account configuration settings.

dtbpCheck.description: Day trading buying power check setting.

pdtCheck.description: Whether PDT protection is enabled (for accounts < $25K).

ptpNoExceptionEntry.description: Whether PTP (Pattern Day Trader) no exceptions mode is enabled.

AddWatchlistAssetRequest.description: AddWatchlistAssetRequest is the request to add an asset to a watchlist.

watchlistId.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).

easyToBorrow.description: Whether the asset is easy to borrow.

exchange.description: Exchange where the asset is traded.

fractionable.description: Whether the asset supports fractional trading.

maintenanceMarginRequirement.description: Whether the asset supports maintenance margin.

CalendarDay.description: CalendarDay represents a market calendar day.

CancelAllOrdersRequest.description: CancelAllOrdersRequest is the request to cancel all open orders.

CancelAllOrdersResponse.description: CancelAllOrdersResponse is the response after canceling all orders.

CancelOrderRequest.description: CancelOrderRequest is the request to cancel an order.

orderId.description: The order ID to cancel (bound from path variable).

CancelOrderResponse.description: CancelOrderResponse is the response after canceling an order.

orderId.description: The order ID that was canceled.

success.description: Whether the cancellation request was accepted.

CanceledOrder.description: CanceledOrder represents a canceled order in the response.

body.description: The order body if cancellation was successful.

id.description: The order ID that was canceled.

status.description: HTTP status code for this cancellation.

Clock.description: Clock represents the current market clock status.

isOpen.description: Whether the market is currently open.

CloseAllPositionsRequest.description: CloseAllPositionsRequest is the request to close all open positions.

cancelOrders.description: Whether to cancel all open orders before closing positions.

CloseAllPositionsResponse.description: CloseAllPositionsResponse is the response after closing all positions.

ClosePositionRequest.description: ClosePositionRequest is the request to close a position.

qty.description: Quantity to close (optional, closes entire position if not specified).

symbol.description: The symbol of the position to close (bound from path variable).

ClosedPosition.description: ClosedPosition represents the result of closing a single position.

status.description: HTTP status code for this close operation.

symbol.description: The symbol of the closed position.

CreateOrderRequest.description: CreateOrderRequest is the request to create a new order.

extendedHours.description: Whether the order is for extended hours.

notional.description: Dollar amount to trade. Required if qty is not specified.

orderClass.description: OrderClass represents the class of order.

qty.description: Number of shares to trade. Required if notional is not specified.

side.description: OrderSide represents the side of an order (buy or sell).

symbol.description: Symbol or asset ID to trade.

timeInForce.description: TimeInForce represents the time in force for an order.

type.description: OrderType represents the type of order.

CreateWatchlistRequest.description: CreateWatchlistRequest is the request to create a watchlist.

items.description: Symbols to add to the watchlist.

DeleteWatchlistRequest.description: DeleteWatchlistRequest is the request to delete a watchlist.

watchlistId.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).

DeleteWatchlistResponse.description: DeleteWatchlistResponse is the response after deleting a watchlist.

ExerciseOptionRequest.description: ExerciseOptionRequest is the request to exercise an option position.

symbolOrContractId.description: The option symbol contract (bound from path variable).

ExerciseOptionResponse.description: ExerciseOptionResponse is the response after exercising an option.

success.description: Whether the exercise request was accepted.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GetAccountActivitiesByTypeRequest.description: GetAccountActivitiesByTypeRequest is the request to get account activities of a specific type.

after.description: Filter by activities after this timestamp (RFC 3339).

pageSize.description: Maximum number of activities to return.

until.description: Filter by activities until this timestamp (RFC 3339).

GetAccountActivitiesRequest.description: GetAccountActivitiesRequest is the request to get account activities.

after.description: Filter by activities after this timestamp (RFC 3339).

pageSize.description: Maximum number of activities to return.

until.description: Filter by activities until this timestamp (RFC 3339).

GetAccountActivitiesResponse.description: GetAccountActivitiesResponse is the response containing account activities.

GetAccountConfigurationsRequest.description: GetAccountConfigurationsRequest is the request to get account configurations.

GetAccountRequest.description:
GetAccountRequest is the request to get the account.
 Account is identified by the API key used for authentication.

GetAssetRequest.description: GetAssetRequest is the request to get an asset by symbol or ID.

symbolOrId.description: The symbol or asset ID (bound from path variable).

GetCalendarRequest.description: GetCalendarRequest is the request to get the market calendar.

GetCalendarResponse.description: GetCalendarResponse is the response containing the market calendar.

GetClockRequest.description: GetClockRequest is the request to get the market clock.

GetOrderByClientIdRequest.description: GetOrderByClientIdRequest is the request to get an order by client order ID.

GetOrderRequest.description: GetOrderRequest is the request to get an order by ID.

nested.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.

orderId.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).

GetPortfolioHistoryRequest.description: GetPortfolioHistoryRequest is the request to get portfolio history.

extendedHours.description: Whether to include extended hours data.

pnlReset.description: Whether to use PnL calculation instead of market value.

GetPositionRequest.description: GetPositionRequest is the request to get a position by symbol.

symbol.description: The symbol of the position (bound from path variable).

GetWatchlistRequest.description: GetWatchlistRequest is the request to get a watchlist by ID.

watchlistId.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).

ListAssetsRequest.description: ListAssetsRequest is the request to list assets.

ListAssetsResponse.description: ListAssetsResponse is the response containing a list of assets.

ListOrdersRequest.description: ListOrdersRequest is the request to list orders.

after.description: Cursor for pagination (order ID to start after).

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return (default 50, max 500).

nested.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.

status.description: Filter by order status (open, closed, all).

until.description: Filter by orders updated before this timestamp.

ListOrdersResponse.description: ListOrdersResponse is the response containing a list of orders.

ListPositionsRequest.description: ListPositionsRequest is the request to list all open positions.

ListPositionsResponse.description: ListPositionsResponse is the response containing all open positions.

ListWatchlistsRequest.description: ListWatchlistsRequest is the request to list watchlists.

ListWatchlistsResponse.description: ListWatchlistsResponse is the response containing a list of watchlists.

canceledAt.description: Timestamp when the order was canceled.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order was created (RFC 3339).

extendedHours.description: Whether the order is for extended hours.

filledAt.description: Timestamp when the order was filled.

hwm.description: High water mark (for trailing stop orders).

orderClass.description: OrderClass represents the class of order.

orderType.description: OrderType represents the type of order.

replacedAt.description: Timestamp when the order was replaced.

replacedBy.description: Order ID that replaced this order.

replaces.description: Order ID that this order replaces.

side.description: OrderSide represents the side of an order (buy or sell).

status.description: OrderStatus represents the status of an order.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the order was submitted.

timeInForce.description: TimeInForce represents the time in force for an order.

type.description: OrderType represents the type of order.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the order was last updated.

PortfolioHistory.description: PortfolioHistory represents the historical performance of a portfolio.

items.description: Portfolio equity values at each timestamp.
Timestamps for each data point (Unix epoch in seconds).

Position.description: Position represents a current holding in a security.

exchange.description: Exchange where the asset is traded.

qtyAvailable.description: Quantity available for trading (excludes open orders).

side.description: PositionSide represents the side of a position.

RemoveWatchlistAssetRequest.description: RemoveWatchlistAssetRequest is the request to remove an asset from a watchlist.

symbol.description: Symbol to remove (bound from path variable).

watchlistId.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).

RemoveWatchlistAssetResponse.description: RemoveWatchlistAssetResponse is the response after removing an asset.

ReplaceOrderRequest.description: ReplaceOrderRequest is the request to replace (modify) an existing order.

limitPrice.description: New limit price (optional, for limit orders).

orderId.description: The order ID to replace (bound from path variable).

qty.description: New quantity (optional, keeps original if not specified).

stopPrice.description: New stop price (optional, for stop orders).

timeInForce.description: TimeInForce represents the time in force for an order.

trail.description: New trail (optional, for trailing stop orders).

StopLossSpec.description: StopLossSpec specifies stop loss parameters for bracket orders.

limitPrice.description: Limit price for stop loss (for stop limit orders).

TakeProfitSpec.description: TakeProfitSpec specifies take profit parameters for bracket orders.

UpdateAccountConfigurationsRequest.description: UpdateAccountConfigurationsRequest is the request to update account configurations.

dtbpCheck.description: Day trading buying power check setting (entry, exit, both).

ptpNoExceptionEntry.description: Whether PTP no exceptions mode is enabled.

UpdateWatchlistRequest.description: UpdateWatchlistRequest is the request to update a watchlist.

watchlistId.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

Watchlist.description: Watchlist represents a list of watched assets.

get.description:
GetAccount retrieves the account information.
 GET /v2/account

GetAccountActivities retrieves account activity events.
 GET /v2/account/activities

parameters.description: Filter by activities after this timestamp (RFC 3339).
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Filter by activities until this timestamp (RFC 3339).
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Maximum number of activities to return.
parameters.name: page_size

get.description:
GetAccountActivitiesByType retrieves account activity events of a specific type.
 GET /v2/account/activities/{activity_type}

parameters.description: Filter by activities after this timestamp (RFC 3339).
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Filter by activities until this timestamp (RFC 3339).
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Maximum number of activities to return.
parameters.name: page_size

get.description:
GetAccountConfigurations retrieves the account configuration settings.
 GET /v2/account/configurations

patch.description:
UpdateAccountConfigurations updates the account configuration settings.
 PATCH /v2/account/configurations

get.description:
GetPortfolioHistory retrieves the historical portfolio performance.
 GET /v2/account/portfolio/history

parameters.description: Whether to use PnL calculation instead of market value.
parameters.name: pnl_reset

parameters.description: Whether to include extended hours data.
parameters.name: extended_hours

get.description:
ListAssets retrieves all available assets.
 GET /v2/assets

GetAsset retrieves a specific asset by symbol or ID.
 GET /v2/assets/{symbol_or_id}

parameters.description: The symbol or asset ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol_or_id

get.description:
GetCalendar retrieves the market calendar.
 GET /v2/calendar

GetClock retrieves the current market clock status.
 GET /v2/clock

delete.description:
CancelAllOrders cancels all open orders.
 DELETE /v2/orders

get.description:
ListOrders retrieves a list of orders.
 GET /v2/orders

parameters.description: Filter by order status (open, closed, all).
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return (default 50, max 500).
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Cursor for pagination (order ID to start after).
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Filter by orders updated before this timestamp.
parameters.name: until

parameters.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.
parameters.name: nested

post.description:
CreateOrder places a new order.
 POST /v2/orders

delete.description:
CancelOrder cancels a specific order.
 DELETE /v2/orders/{order_id}

parameters.description: The order ID to cancel (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: order_id

get.description:
GetOrder retrieves a specific order by ID.
 GET /v2/orders/{order_id}

parameters.description: The order ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: order_id

parameters.description: Whether to include nested leg orders.
parameters.name: nested

patch.description:
ReplaceOrder replaces (modifies) an existing order.
 PATCH /v2/orders/{order_id}

parameters.description: The order ID to replace (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: order_id

get.description:
GetOrderByClientId retrieves an order by client order ID.
 GET /v2/orders:by_client_order_id

delete.description:
CloseAllPositions closes all open positions.
 DELETE /v2/positions

parameters.description: Whether to cancel all open orders before closing positions.
parameters.name: cancel_orders

get.description:
ListPositions retrieves all open positions.
 GET /v2/positions

post.description:
ExerciseOption exercises an option position.
 POST /v2/positions/{symbol_or_contract_id}/exercise

parameters.description: The option symbol contract (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol_or_contract_id

delete.description:
ClosePosition closes a specific position (liquidates).
 DELETE /v2/positions/{symbol}

parameters.description: The symbol of the position to close (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol

parameters.description: Quantity to close (optional, closes entire position if not specified).
parameters.name: qty

get.description:
GetPosition retrieves a specific position by symbol.
 GET /v2/positions/{symbol}

parameters.description: The symbol of the position (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol

post.description:
CreateWatchlist creates a new watchlist.
 POST /v2/watchlists

parameters.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: watchlist_id

get.description:
GetWatchlist retrieves a specific watchlist by ID.
 GET /v2/watchlists/{watchlist_id}

parameters.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: watchlist_id

post.description:
AddWatchlistAsset adds an asset to a watchlist.
 POST /v2/watchlists/{watchlist_id}

parameters.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: watchlist_id

put.description:
UpdateWatchlist updates an existing watchlist.
 PUT /v2/watchlists/{watchlist_id}

parameters.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: watchlist_id

delete.description:
RemoveWatchlistAsset removes an asset from a watchlist.
 DELETE /v2/watchlists/{watchlist_id}/{symbol}

parameters.description: The watchlist ID (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: watchlist_id

parameters.description: Symbol to remove (bound from path variable).
parameters.name: symbol
